name: Car Hockey (prototype)
description:
Description

Car Hockey is a short party game for two players. The goal of the game is to be the first to score 5 points. Give it a try and have fun!

Controls:

Player1:

Keyboard

WASD - Car Movement

Player 2:

Keyboard

Arrow Keys - Car Movement

You can also play on controllers and take your expirience to the next level!

Xbox Controller/PS4 Controller

A/X - Acceleration

B/O - Break

Steering - Left Stick

Planned Features:
  • Change graphic for hockey puck
  • Make Single Player mode with 30 levels inside
  • Level menu for Single Player mode
  • Soundtrack for main menu
  • Credits option

Game is in development and this version is first prototype. Let me know if You like it, and add it to Your collection on itch.io!

Also check out my other projects!

https://noobsgames.itch.io/

BR,

Michael AKA Noob's Games
